channel.title: Adding command
channel.description: im coding my own server from baicly a bank source, if anyone can please help whats the code i would add in client.java so i can do ::npc?

item.title: Adding command
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try
{
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC >= 0)
{
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel);
sendMessage(“You spawn an npc”);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}}

Read full topic
